title: Hypotheses to test mean flight time

content.prompt: An airline claims that the mean flight time between City X and City Y is 38 minutes. After taking many flights, a local business group believes that the claim is unrealistic and that the actual mean flight time is greater than 38 minutes. If the group conducts a study to investigate its belief, which of the following hypotheses should be tested?

topic.text: 7.4: Setting Up a Test for a Population Mean

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Identify null and alternative hypotheses.
